channel.title: What do you think of the new updates?
channel.description: What do you think of the new updates jagex has bring along the years?

item.title: What do you think of the new updates?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Screw RS now, I’d rather go back to 06 where PK’ing existed.

I don’t care if they brought “most” of it back. I want 100%.

item.source: What do you think of the new updates?

item.title: What do you think of the new updates?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I completely lost trust in jagex and the game when they removed proper pking (the way that we all remember it). I have not played seriously ever since and I am guessing a lot of people have done the same.
I was quite angry when they added the widly ditch, fucked up pest control etc etc but I just played on… but removal of proper pking was the last straw.
I cannot deny that features like the Grand Exchange, Soul wars and some other shit are really good but I still prefer the good old days when everything wasn’t so serious!

I just remembered drop trading, law running, epic luring, quick trade scamming, gmaul spec glitch, the shit graphics and so on…

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think of the new updates?

item.title: What do you think of the new updates?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:13, topic:347455”]I honestly haven’t had any disagreement with any updates.

The only issue I wish Jagex would change is merching clans. As a single person who merches, I find myself often getting shit on by people with a net value of billions. Now realize I merch rares, and they are in a shit hole right now.[/quote]

I don’t merch, but it’s a pain in the ass when they start merching an item such as potions. Ranging/prayer in particular.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think of the new updates?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I quit, so I cannot say anything good/bad about Runescape’s current updates.

But the game that once was, was good, even the 500-513, was good.

I noticed it going downhill from after Dragon Claws were released. (and of course no pking, and no duel)

Read full topic
